title: Amarula and cinnamon Dom Pedro
text:
1. Caramel: Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the sugar and cream and cook over medium heat, stirring continuously until the sugar has dissolved.

2. Bring the sauce to the boil then simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla essence and salt. Set aside until cool.

3. Milkshake: Put the ice cream, milk and cinnamon in a measuring jug. Blend with a stick blender and add the Amarula (if using). Pulse until well combined.

4. Sweeten the milkshake to your liking with the caramel sauce.

5. To finish: Divide the milkshake among six small mugs. Sprinkle ground cinnamon over and serve immediately
description: The Dom Pedro is a South African restaurant staple. We make ours with Amarula, cinnamon and home-made caramel sauce. Serve it cold for dessert.
